definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: exact meaning dub. (cf. Syr. ramko0 herd; foreign wd.; Pahlavi ramak, N Pers. rmh, herd of sheep, horses, etc., Thes:1291 Vullers:ii. 52; in NH mule born of mare and he-ass);—[[בְּנֵי הָרַמָּכִים]] Es 8:10 usu. sons of the (royal) mares, said of [[הָרֶכֶשׁ]].
